title: Mercadolibre
description: Part of Mercadolibre Ads team. Using React, SSR, Sass and other tools to build a great user experience.

title: Blockchain Foundry
description: Lead dev at NFKeys, LODE Wallet and FoundrySwap. Actively participated in development and technical discussion for Metacademy and LastKnown projects. Actively acted as code reviewer in most company projects.

activeProjects.title: Lode Wallet
activeProjects.description: Lead developer. I learned a lot about Mobile and Blockchain development working in this project. Microservices were developed using ExpressJS.

activeProjects.title: Metacademy
activeProjects.description: Focused on backend development and code reviewing. Involved in minting, user interaction with Metamask and interactive tests.

activeProjects.title: FoundrySwap
activeProjects.description: Lead developer. App that allows you to swap tokens between UTXO/NEVM versions of Syscoin Blockchain.

activeProjects.title: NFKeys
activeProjects.description: Lead developer. Wrote first API version with NestJS then moved to a code reviewer role. Constantly in touch with the team to discuss technical details and architecture.

activeProjects.title: LastKnown
activeProjects.description: Developed a customizable NFT Drop Page for artists and creators. Developed following Open-Closed Principle and Plug&Play architecture.

title: Webgains
description: Developed and maintained frontend codebase using React, while making contributions to backend development. Improved development practices and introduced the usage of modern tools for an affiliate marketing app using React/Laravel/MySQL stack.

activeProjects.title: Webgains Advertiser Platform
activeProjects.description: Maintained and extended the Advertiser Platform. Developed new features and improved existing ones. Actively contributor of the backend written in Laravel.

title: Thrifa
description: MERN stack consultant and Lead Developer for Masterminer and Syscoin Fusion Wallet. The development of these two apps earned me some recognition within the Syscoin community which led me to opportunities within the Blockchain space.
